metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: 1km/5day compositing Leaf Area Index (LAI) product of the Heihe River Basin (2010-2014)
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域1km/5天合成叶面积指数（LAI）数据集（2010-2014）
metadata.description: The 1 km / 5-day Lai data set of Heihe River basin provides the 5-day Lai synthesis results of 2010-2014. The data uses Terra / MODIS, Aqua / MODIS, as well as domestic satellites fy3a / MERSI and fy3b / MERSI sensor data to build a multi-source remote sensing data set with a spatial resolution of 1 km and a time resolution of 5 days. Multi-source remote sensing data sets can provide more angles and more observations than a single sensor in a limited time. However, due to the difference of on orbit running time and performance of sensors, the observation quality of multi-source data sets is uneven. Therefore, in order to make more effective use of multi-source data sets, the algorithm first classifies the quality of multi-source data sets, which can be divided into first level data, second level data and third level data according to the observation rationality. The third level data are observations polluted by thin clouds and are not used for calculation. The purpose of quality evaluation and classification is to provide the basis for the selection of the optimal data set and the design of inversion algorithm flow. Leaf area index product inversion algorithm is designed to distinguish mountain land and vegetation type, using different neural network inversion model. Based on global DEM map and surface classification map, PROSAIL model is used for continuous vegetation such as grassland and crops, and gost model is used for forest and mountain vegetation. Using the reference map generated by the measured ground data of the forests in the upper reaches of Heihe River and the oasis in the middle reaches, and scaling up the corresponding high-resolution reference map to 1km resolution, compared with the Lai product, the product has a good correlation between the farmland and the forest area and the reference value, and the overall accuracy basically meets the accuracy threshold of 0.5%, 20% specified by GCOS. By cross comparing this product with Lais products such as MODIS, geov1 and glass, the accuracy of this Lai product is better than that of similar products compared with reference value. In a word, the synthetic Lai data set of 1km / 5 days in Heihe River Basin comprehensively uses multi-source remote sensing data to improve the estimation accuracy and time resolution of Lai parameter products, so as to better serve the application of remote sensing data products.
metadata.descriptionCn: 黑河流域1km/5天合成叶面积指数（LAI）数据集提供了2010-2014年的5天LAI合成结果，该数据利用Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS、以及国产卫星FY3A/MERSI和FY3B/MERSI传感器数据构建空间分辨率1km、时间分辨率5天的多源遥感数据集。多源遥感数据集可在有限时间内提供比单一传感器更多的角度和更多次的观测，但是，由于传感器的在轨运行时间及性能差异，多源数据集的观测质量参差不齐。因此，为更有效的利用多源数据集，算法首先对多源数据集进行了质量分级，根据观测合理性分为一级数据、二级数据、三级数据。三级数据为受薄云污染的观测，不用于计算。质量评估及分级的目的是为LAI反演时最优数据集的选择及反演算法流程设计提供依据。叶面积指数产品反演算法设计为区分山地平地、区分植被类型使用不同模型的神经网络法反演。基于全球DEM图和地表分类图，针对草地和农作物等连续植被采用PROSAIL模型，针对森林和山地植被采用坡面GOST模型。利用黑河上游森林和中游绿洲的地面实测数据生成的参考图，并将对应的高分辨率参考图升尺度到1km分辨率，与LAI产品进行比较，产品在农田和森林区域与参考值间均具有良好的相关性，总体精度基本满足GCOS规定的误差不超过 (0.5, 20%)的精度阈值。将本产品与MODIS、GEOV1和GLASS等LAI产品进行交叉对比，相比较参考值而言，本LAI产品精度优于同类产品。总之，黑河流域1km/5天合成LAI数据集综合利用多源遥感数据以提高LAI参数产品的估算精度、时间分辨率等，更好的服务于遥感数据产品的应用。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 在异质表面上生态水文过程的上升尺度是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在分层嵌套尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，针对绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器以层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个EC塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙质沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了LiDAR、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统包括涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

background: The Earth’s surface radiation budget is an essential parameter for estimation of the surface energy budget and is used for various applications, including weather prediction, monitoring and analysis of climate, and terrestrial ecological and hydrological systems. As a particularly important component of the surface radiation budget, surface solar irradiance (SSI) is the primary source of energy for the Earth’s surface; it controls the total energy exchange between the atmosphere and the land‐ocean surface and also serves as a key driving force for evapotranspiration, plant growth, and related processes. SSI data with large geographical coverage (up to global) and high spatiotemporal resolution can be obtained from satellite data. Estimating the surface solar radiation using satellite remote sensing techniques is essential not only for complementing the sparse network of surface station measurements, but also for verifying climate model output and reanalysis data.
research objective: In this paper, a new satellite‐derived approach for obtaining instantaneous surface solar irradiance (SSI) by combining Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) and Multifunctional Transport Satellite (MTSAT) data is presented and validated using one year pyranometer measurements from five stations in northern China.
challenges: However, in mountainous areas the results need further refinement.
methods: Here we use MTSAT data to capture the changes of cloud fields in the atmosphere and use MODIS products to obtain the dynamic aerosol loading, water vapor content, surface reflectance, and other information. Meanwhile, on the basis of instantaneous retrieval results, the calculation of hourly average SSI is also explored.
dataset: Two types of satellite data were used in this study: polar‐orbiting satellite products from multispectral MODIS, and geostationary meteorological satellite data from the Multifunctional Transport Satellite MTSAT1R. The pyranometer data for validation come from five meteorological stations where the SSI is measured alongside other meteorological parameters. These stations are the Guantao and Daxing experimental stations in north China and the Yingke oasis station, Huazhaizi desert station, and A’rou freeze‐thaw observation station in northwest China.
findings: The preliminary validation demonstrates that both instantaneous and hourly SSIs can be produced accurately over northern China using this approach, and the retrieval quality of hourly SSI data is slightly better than that of instantaneous SSI data.
backgroundCn: 地球表面的辐射预算是估算表面能量预算的重要参数，广泛应用于天气预测、气候监测与分析以及陆地生态和水文系统。作为表面辐射预算中一个特别重要的组成部分，表面太阳辐射（SSI）是地球表面的主要能量来源；它控制着大气与陆地-海洋表面之间的总能量交换，并且是蒸散、植物生长及相关过程的关键驱动力。可以通过卫星数据获取具有大范围（可达全球）和高时空分辨率的SSI数据。利用卫星遥感技术估算表面太阳辐射不仅对补充稀疏的地面站测量网络至关重要，还对验证气候模型输出和再分析数据具有重要意义。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，提出了一种新的卫星衍生方法，通过结合中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）和多功能运输卫星（MTSAT）数据来获取瞬时地表太阳辐射（SSI），并使用来自中国北方五个站点的一年光伏仪测量数据进行了验证。
challengesCn: 然而，在山区，结果需要进一步的细化。
methodsCn: 在这里，我们使用MTSAT数据捕捉大气中云场的变化，并利用MODIS产品获取动态气溶胶负荷、水汽含量、地表反射率等信息。同时，在瞬时反演结果的基础上，还探讨了小时平均SSI的计算。
datasetCn: 本研究使用了两种类型的卫星数据：来自多光谱MODIS的极地轨道卫星产品，以及来自多功能运输卫星MTSAT1R的地球静止气象卫星数据。用于验证的辐射计数据来自五个气象站，这些气象站测量太阳辐射强度（SSI）以及其他气象参数。这些气象站包括位于中国北方的官陶和大兴实验站，以及位于中国西北部的英克绿洲站、华寨子沙漠站和阿柔冻融观测站。
findingsCn: 初步验证表明，使用这种方法可以准确生成中国北方的瞬时和小时太阳辐射强度（SSI），而小时SSI数据的检索质量略优于瞬时SSI数据。

Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 动态气溶胶负载、水汽含量、地表反射率、云场变化

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many intensive observation periods (IOPs) were conducted as part of the HiWATER experiment in 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 2012年HiWATER实验共进行了多少次强化观测期（IOPs）？
Quantification.AnswerEn: The original answer does not specify an exact number of intensive observation periods (IOPs) conducted as part of the HiWATER experiment in 2012, so there is no numerical value to extract.
Quantification.AnswerCn: 原始答案没有具体说明2012年HiWATER实验中进行的强化观测期（IOPs）的确切数量，因此没有可提取的数值。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many airborne remote sensing missions were conducted during the HiWATER experiment to cover the FEA?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在HiWATER实验期间，为了覆盖FEA，进行了多少次空中遥感任务？

Definition.QuestionEn: How is the quality of a multi-source remote sensing dataset evaluated and classified?
Definition.QuestionCn: 多源遥感数据集的质量如何评估和分类？
Definition.AnswerEn: The quality of a multi-source remote sensing dataset is evaluated and classified based on the observation's reasonableness and performance differences among sensors. The data is categorized into different quality levels, such as primary, secondary, and tertiary data, where tertiary data is affected by thin cloud contamination and not used in calculations. This classification aids in selecting the optimal dataset for parameter retrieval algorithms.
Definition.AnswerCn: 多源遥感数据集的质量根据观测的合理性和传感器之间的性能差异进行评估和分类。数据被分为不同的质量等级，如主要数据、次要数据和三级数据，其中三级数据受到薄云污染的影响，不用于计算。这种分类有助于选择最佳数据集以用于参数检索算法。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences between the multiscale dataset from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) and traditional hydrometeorological datasets?
Comparison.QuestionCn: Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER)的多尺度数据集与传统水文气象数据集之间的相似性和差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The multiscale dataset from HiWATER incorporates a hierarchical observation system with instruments like eddy covariance towers, LiDAR, and imaging spectrometers, capturing detailed eco-hydrological processes at various scales. Traditional hydrometeorological datasets may not have the same hierarchical structure and often lack the integration of high-resolution airborne remote sensing data. Both types aim to provide comprehensive environmental data, but HiWATER's dataset is specifically designed for multiscale and multidisciplinary coverage, addressing challenges in eco-hydrological process upscaling.
Comparison.AnswerCn: HiWATER的多尺度数据集采用了分层观测系统，配备了涡度协方差塔、激光雷达和成像光谱仪，能够在不同尺度上捕捉详细的生态水文过程。传统的水文气象数据集可能没有相同的层次结构，并且通常缺乏高分辨率的航空遥感数据的整合。这两种数据集都旨在提供全面的环境数据，但HiWATER的数据集专门设计用于多尺度和多学科覆盖，解决生态水文过程上尺度化中的挑战。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the challenges in capturing surface solar irradiance (SSI) data using satellite remote sensing compare to those faced when using ground-based pyranometer measurements?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 捕捉表面太阳辐射（SSI）数据时，使用卫星遥感面临的挑战与使用地面辐射计测量时所面临的挑战相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Capturing surface solar irradiance (SSI) using satellite remote sensing offers extensive geographical coverage and high spatiotemporal resolution, which is not achievable with ground-based pyranometers that provide point-specific measurements. However, satellite methods face challenges in mountainous areas where results require refinement. Ground-based pyranometer measurements are limited by their sparse network but are crucial for validating satellite-derived data. Both methods aim to accurately estimate surface solar radiation but encounter different technical and environmental challenges.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 利用卫星遥感捕捉地表太阳辐射（SSI）提供了广泛的地理覆盖和高时空分辨率，这是地面辐射计无法实现的，因为后者只能提供特定点的测量。然而，卫星方法在山区面临挑战，结果需要进行修正。地面辐射计的测量由于网络稀疏而受到限制，但对于验证卫星衍生数据至关重要。这两种方法都旨在准确估计地表太阳辐射，但面临不同的技术和环境挑战。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do multi-source remote sensing techniques enhance the estimation accuracy and temporal resolution of eco-hydrological parameters in heterogeneous landscapes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多源遥感技术如何提高异质景观中生态水文参数的估计精度和时间分辨率？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Multi-source remote sensing techniques enhance the estimation accuracy and temporal resolution by utilizing data from various sensors such as Terra/MODIS, Aqua/MODIS, and FY3A/MERSI, constructing a dataset with a spatial resolution of 1km and a temporal resolution of 5 days. These techniques provide more angles and frequent observations compared to a single sensor, allowing for a comprehensive synthesis of data. Quality grading of observations ensures the selection of optimal datasets for leaf area index (LAI) inversion, improving the parameter accuracy.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多源遥感技术通过利用来自不同传感器的数据，如Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS和FY3A/MERSI，增强了估计的准确性和时间分辨率，构建了一个空间分辨率为1公里、时间分辨率为5天的数据集。这些技术提供了比单一传感器更多的角度和更频繁的观测，允许对数据进行全面综合。观测的质量分级确保了选择最佳数据集用于叶面积指数（LAI）反演，从而提高了参数的准确性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the challenges of capturing eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface, and how can hierarchically nested instrumentation designs address these challenges?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在异质表面上捕捉生态水文过程的挑战是什么？分层嵌套的仪器设计如何应对这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The challenges include the poor availability of multiscale observations, which hinder the progress in upscaling eco-hydrological processes. Hierarchically nested instrumentation designs, such as those implemented in the HiWATER experiment, address these challenges by deploying instruments at multiple scales to capture diverse eco-hydrological processes. This includes a sparse network for oasis-desert interactions and a superstation within the oasis, supplemented by environmental sensors and remote sensing missions, providing comprehensive data coverage.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括多尺度观测的稀缺性，这阻碍了生态水文过程的上尺度化进展。层次嵌套的仪器设计，例如在HiWATER实验中实施的设计，通过在多个尺度上部署仪器来应对这些挑战，以捕捉多样的生态水文过程。这包括用于绿洲-沙漠相互作用的稀疏网络和绿洲内的超级站点，辅以环境传感器和遥感任务，提供全面的数据覆盖。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methodologies are effective in using satellite-derived data to estimate surface solar irradiance (SSI) and refine results in complex terrains?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 有效利用卫星衍生数据估算地表太阳辐射（SSI）并在复杂地形中优化结果的方法论有哪些？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Effective methodologies involve combining data from polar-orbiting satellites like MODIS and geostationary satellites like MTSAT. This approach captures atmospheric changes, aerosol loading, and surface reflectance. Validation against pyranometer measurements ensures accuracy, while the refinement of results, especially in mountainous areas, may require further methodology adjustments to account for terrain-specific factors affecting SSI estimation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 有效的方法论涉及结合极轨卫星如MODIS和静止卫星如MTSAT的数据。这种方法能够捕捉大气变化、气溶胶负荷和表面反射率。通过与辐射计测量结果进行验证，确保了准确性，而在山区地区，结果的精细化可能需要进一步调整方法，以考虑影响太阳辐射强度（SSI）估计的地形特定因素。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes variability in the observation quality among different sensors used in data collection for eco-hydrological studies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 不同传感器在生态水文研究中的数据收集观察质量差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variability in observation quality among different sensors used in data collection for eco-hydrological studies is primarily due to differences in the sensors' operational times and performance capabilities while in orbit.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，不同传感器在数据收集中的观测质量变异主要是由于传感器在轨道上的操作时间和性能能力的差异。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it crucial to implement intensive observation periods and continuous hydrometeorological observations in eco-hydrological research?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在生态水文研究中实施密集观测期和持续的水文气象观测至关重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Intensive observation periods and continuous hydrometeorological observations are crucial to ensure the capture of multi-scale eco-hydrological processes, especially in heterogeneous surfaces like oasis-desert systems, where sparse networks and superstations are strategically placed to gather comprehensive data.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 密集的观测周期和连续的水文气象观测对于捕捉多尺度生态水文过程至关重要，特别是在像绿洲-沙漠系统这样异质的表面上，稀疏的网络和超级站点被战略性地布置以收集全面的数据。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges of accurately estimating surface solar irradiance (SSI) in mountainous areas using satellite data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在山区使用卫星数据准确估计地表太阳辐射（SSI）面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges of accurately estimating surface solar irradiance (SSI) in mountainous areas using satellite data arise due to the complex terrain, which affects cloud field changes and surface reflectance, requiring further refinement in the retrieval techniques.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在山区使用卫星数据准确估计表面太阳辐射（SSI）的挑战源于复杂的地形，这影响了云场变化和表面反射率，因此需要进一步改进检索技术。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of integrating multi-source remote sensing data in the estimation of leaf area index (LAI) compared to using a single sensor source?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合多源遥感数据在叶面积指数（LAI）估计中的潜在结果与使用单一传感器源相比有哪些？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating multi-source remote sensing data can provide more angles and observational opportunities within a limited time, potentially leading to improved estimation accuracy and time resolution of LAI parameters. It allows for better data selection and algorithm design by leveraging quality assessments and classification of data into levels based on observation rationality.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合多源遥感数据可以在有限的时间内提供更多的角度和观测机会，从而有可能提高LAI参数的估计精度和时间分辨率。通过利用质量评估和根据观测合理性将数据分类为不同级别，它允许更好的数据选择和算法设计。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the consequences of implementing hierarchically nested scales in instrumentation for eco-hydrological data collection?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在生态水文数据收集的仪器中实施层次嵌套尺度可能会产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using hierarchically nested scales in instrumentation can capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes effectively, enabling comprehensive data collection across different landscapes such as oasis, desert, and wetland areas. It helps in understanding interactions within oasis-desert systems and provides detailed data that can be used for various eco-hydrological research purposes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用分层嵌套尺度的仪器可以有效捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，从而在绿洲、沙漠和湿地等不同景观中进行全面的数据收集。这有助于理解绿洲-沙漠系统内的相互作用，并提供可用于各种生态水文研究目的的详细数据。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the possible effects of using satellite remote sensing techniques on estimating surface solar radiation in comparison to traditional surface station measurements?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感技术估计地表太阳辐射与传统地面站测量相比，可能产生的影响有哪些？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing techniques for estimating surface solar radiation can provide large geographical coverage and high spatiotemporal resolution, complementing the sparse network of surface station measurements. This approach can also aid in verifying climate models and reanalysis data, although it may require refinement in mountainous areas to improve accuracy.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感技术用于估算地表太阳辐射，可以提供大范围的地理覆盖和高时空分辨率，补充稀疏的地面站点测量网络。这种方法还可以帮助验证气候模型和再分析数据，尽管在山区可能需要进行改进以提高准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use multi-source remote sensing data for estimating leaf area index (LAI) in eco-hydrological studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，使用多源遥感数据估计叶面积指数（LAI）的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Multi-source remote sensing data allows for more comprehensive observations by providing multiple angles and more frequent observations than single-sensor data. This approach helps improve the estimation accuracy and temporal resolution of LAI parameter products, which is crucial for effective application in remote sensing data products.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 多源遥感数据通过提供多个角度和更频繁的观测，允许更全面的观察。这种方法有助于提高叶面积指数（LAI）参数产品的估计精度和时间分辨率，这对于遥感数据产品的有效应用至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of implementing hierarchical instrumentation in the HiWATER experiment?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在HiWATER实验中实施分层仪器的目的是为了什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The hierarchical instrumentation in the HiWATER experiment is designed to capture multiscale and multidisciplinary data, addressing the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces and improving the availability of multiscale observations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验中的分层仪器设计旨在捕获多尺度和多学科的数据，解决在异质表面上对生态水文过程进行上尺度处理的挑战，并提高多尺度观测的可用性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are used to ensure the quality and reliability of data collected from multiscale remote sensing platforms for eco-hydrological analysis?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保从多尺度遥感平台收集的生态水文分析数据的质量和可靠性，采用了哪些方法？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The multiscale dataset obtained from the Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) includes a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations. Quality control is ensured through sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and dataset generation, with all observational data being carefully quality controlled throughout these stages.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 从黑河流域联合遥感实验研究（HiWATER）获得的多尺度数据集包括涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站的通量观测矩阵。通过传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成，确保了质量控制，所有观测数据在这些阶段中都经过仔细的质量控制。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are different satellite and ground-based data sources integrated to improve the accuracy of surface solar irradiance (SSI) estimations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 不同的卫星和地面数据源是如何整合以提高地表太阳辐射（SSI）估计的准确性的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To estimate SSI, the approach combines Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) products for dynamic aerosol loading, water vapor content, and surface reflectance, with changes in cloud fields captured by the Multifunctional Transport Satellite (MTSAT) data. This integration is validated using pyranometer measurements from meteorological stations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了估计SSI，该方法结合了中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）产品，用于动态气溶胶负荷、水汽含量和地表反射率，以及通过多功能运输卫星（MTSAT）数据捕获的云场变化。该集成通过气象站的辐射计测量进行验证。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in constructing a multiscale observation system to study eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中构建多尺度观测系统以研究生态水文过程涉及哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the HiWATER experiment, the observation system was constructed with a sparse network to investigate oasis-desert interaction, including one superstation in the oasis and multiple eddy covariance towers and automatic meteorological stations in different surrounding landscapes. Additionally, 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer to cover the field experimental area (FEA).
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在HiWATER实验中，观察系统采用稀疏网络构建，以研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用，包括在绿洲建立一个超级站，以及在不同周边景观中设置多个涡度协方差塔和自动气象站。此外，还进行了12次航空遥感任务，使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计，覆盖了现场实验区域（FEA）。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies allow the integration of multiple satellite data sources to improve the accuracy and temporal resolution of leaf area index (LAI) datasets?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论可以整合多个卫星数据源，以提高叶面积指数（LAI）数据集的准确性和时间分辨率？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve using data from Terra/MODIS, Aqua/MODIS, FY3A/MERSI, and FY3B/MERSI sensors to construct a multi-source remote sensing dataset with a spatial resolution of 1km and a temporal resolution of 5 days. The data undergo quality grading and the algorithm design includes neural network inversion methods that differentiate between mountain plains and vegetation types using different models.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS、FY3A/MERSI和FY3B/MERSI传感器的数据，构建一个空间分辨率为1公里、时间分辨率为5天的多源遥感数据集。数据经过质量评估，算法设计包括神经网络反演方法，利用不同模型区分山地平原和植被类型。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What role does hierarchical instrumentation play in enabling detailed observation of oasis-desert interactions in eco-hydrological studies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 分层仪器在生态水文研究中对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的详细观察发挥了什么作用？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Hierarchical instrumentation, including a sparse network of eddy covariance towers, automatic meteorological stations, and eco-hydrological sensor networks, enables detailed observations by capturing multiscale data. Instruments are arranged to capture interactions between different landscapes, such as oasis, sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland, facilitating the study of oasis-desert interactions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 分层仪器，包括稀疏的涡度协方差塔、自动气象站和生态水文传感器网络，使得通过捕捉多尺度数据进行详细观察成为可能。仪器的布置旨在捕捉不同景观之间的相互作用，如绿洲、沙漠、沙砾地、荒漠草原和湿地，从而促进对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的研究。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges associated with the availability of multiscale observations in eco-hydrological data collection methods?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在生态水文数据收集方法中，多尺度观测的可用性可能面临挑战的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Progress in the field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations, which can be attributed to the complexity of capturing multi-scale eco-hydrological processes across different landscapes, as demonstrated by the need for hierarchically nested scales and a sparse network of diverse instrumentation.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍，这可以归因于在不同景观中捕捉多尺度生态水文过程的复杂性，正如需要层次嵌套的尺度和稀疏的多样化仪器网络所示。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using multiscale and multidisciplinary data collection methods in addressing eco-hydrological challenges in heterogeneous landscapes?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在异质景观中使用多尺度和多学科数据收集方法解决生态水文挑战的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of multiscale and multidisciplinary data collection methods, such as those employed in HiWATER, appears to be an effective approach for addressing eco-hydrological challenges in heterogeneous landscapes. The hierarchical nesting of instruments and the integration of different data types, including eddy covariance towers and airborne remote sensing, allow for a comprehensive understanding of complex eco-hydrological processes across different scales. However, the success of this approach relies heavily on the careful calibration and quality control of all observational data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用多尺度和多学科的数据收集方法，例如在HiWATER中采用的方法，似乎是解决异质景观中生态水文挑战的有效途径。仪器的层次嵌套以及不同数据类型的整合，包括涡度协方差塔和航空遥感，能够全面理解不同尺度上复杂的生态水文过程。然而，这种方法的成功在很大程度上依赖于对所有观测数据的仔细校准和质量控制。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential challenges in achieving high accuracy with satellite-derived datasets for estimating surface solar irradiance (SSI) in mountainous regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在山区利用卫星衍生数据集估算地表太阳辐射（SSI）时，可能面临的挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Satellite-derived datasets for estimating SSI face challenges in mountainous regions due to complex terrain, which can affect the retrieval of accurate surface reflectance and atmospheric parameters. The approach combining MODIS and MTSAT data shows potential, but further refinement is needed to address these challenges. The dynamic nature of cloud fields and aerosols in mountainous areas may require more sophisticated models and validation efforts using ground-based measurements to improve accuracy.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 卫星衍生的数据集在估算土壤湿度指数（SSI）时面临山区复杂地形的挑战，这可能影响表面反射率和大气参数的准确获取。结合MODIS和MTSAT数据的方法显示出潜力，但仍需进一步改进以应对这些挑战。山区云场和气溶胶的动态特性可能需要更复杂的模型和使用地面测量进行验证的努力，以提高准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you assess the impact of integrating multiple remote sensing sources on the precision and temporal resolution of leaf area index (LAI) datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估整合多个遥感源对叶面积指数（LAI）数据集的精度和时间分辨率的影响？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple remote sensing sources significantly enhances the precision and temporal resolution of LAI datasets. By using data from various sensors like Terra/MODIS, Aqua/MODIS, and FY3A/MERSI, a more comprehensive dataset is achieved, providing frequent observations and better spatial coverage. The quality grading and selection of optimal data for LAI retrieval further improve the product's accuracy. This integrated approach allows for more reliable LAI estimates, especially when compared to those derived from single-sensor datasets.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合多个遥感源显著提高了LAI数据集的精度和时间分辨率。通过使用来自不同传感器的数据，如Terra/MODIS、Aqua/MODIS和FY3A/MERSI，获得了更全面的数据集，提供了更频繁的观测和更好的空间覆盖。质量分级和最佳数据选择进一步提高了LAI提取产品的准确性。这种综合方法使得LAI估计更加可靠，尤其是与单一传感器数据集得出的结果相比。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how multiscale observations can be effectively collected and managed from such a diverse set of environmental conditions in the Heihe River Basin.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何在黑河流域如此多样的环境条件下有效地收集和管理多尺度观测数据。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment addresses the challenge of collecting multiscale observations by using a hierarchically nested scale approach. This includes a range of instruments such as a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations, as well as hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing with LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer. These tools capture eco-hydrological processes across different landscapes, and careful quality control is applied throughout sensor calibration, data collection, processing, and dataset generation.
Assertion.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验通过采用分层嵌套尺度的方法来应对收集多尺度观测的挑战。这包括一系列仪器，如涡度协方差塔的通量观测矩阵、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站，以及使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感。这些工具捕捉不同景观中的生态水文过程，并在传感器校准、数据收集、处理和数据集生成的整个过程中进行仔细的质量控制。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure how the quality of multi-source remote sensing datasets is assessed and maintained, especially when dealing with diverse sensor data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定如何评估和维护多源遥感数据集的质量，特别是在处理不同传感器数据时。
Assertion.AnswerEn: In the context of the Heihe River Basin LAI data collection, the quality of multi-source remote sensing datasets is assessed by implementing a grading system based on observational rationality. The data are categorized into primary, secondary, and tertiary, with the tertiary data being affected by thin cloud pollution and excluded from calculations. This quality assessment helps in selecting optimal datasets for LAI inversion and guides the design of retrieval algorithms.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在黑河流域LAI数据收集的背景下，通过实施基于观测合理性的分级系统来评估多源遥感数据集的质量。数据被分为一级、二级和三级，其中三级数据受到薄云污染的影响，排除在计算之外。这种质量评估有助于选择最佳数据集用于LAI反演，并指导检索算法的设计。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how different models are chosen for LAI inversion when dealing with diverse vegetation types and topographies.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解在处理不同植被类型和地形时，如何选择不同的模型进行LAI反演。
Assertion.AnswerEn: For LAI inversion, different models are selected based on the specific characteristics of vegetation types and topography. The PROSAIL model is used for continuous vegetation like grassland and crops, while the slope GOST model is used for forest and mountainous vegetation. This differentiation is informed by a global DEM map and surface classification map, ensuring that the most suitable model is applied for accurate LAI estimation.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 对于LAI反演，根据植被类型和地形的特定特征选择不同的模型。PROSAIL模型用于连续植被，如草地和农作物，而坡度GOST模型则用于森林和山区植被。这种区分是基于全球数字高程模型（DEM）地图和地表分类地图，确保应用最合适的模型以实现准确的LAI估计。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the multiscale data collection methods used to address the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结用于解决异质表面生态水文过程上升尺度挑战的多尺度数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The multiscale data collection methods involve the use of instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to capture eco-hydrological processes. This includes a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, automatic meteorological stations, and an eco-hydrological sensor network. Hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer is utilized alongside synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 多尺度数据收集方法涉及在层次嵌套的尺度上使用仪器来捕捉生态水文过程。这包括涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪、自动气象站和生态水文传感器网络的通量观测矩阵。超高分辨率的航空遥感使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计，并与同步的地面植被动态和光合作用过程测量相结合。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges associated with using multiscale remote sensing data for eco-hydrological research in desert-oasis systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在沙漠-绿洲系统中使用多尺度遥感数据进行生态水文研究所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: One of the primary challenges is the poor availability of multiscale observations. The observational data's quality can vary due to differences in sensor performance and operational time. Furthermore, in mountainous areas, results from satellite-derived data may require further refinement to improve accuracy.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 主要挑战之一是多尺度观测的可用性差。观测数据的质量可能因传感器性能和操作时间的不同而有所差异。此外，在山区，卫星衍生数据的结果可能需要进一步的修正以提高准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential datasets available for analyzing surface solar irradiance and how they can be validated using ground-based measurements.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨可用于分析表面太阳辐射的潜在数据集，以及如何使用地面测量进行验证。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets for analyzing surface solar irradiance include satellite-derived data from sources like MODIS and MTSAT. These datasets can be validated using pyranometer measurements from meteorological stations, such as those located at Guantao, Daxing, Yingke oasis, Huazhaizi desert, and A’rou freeze-thaw observation stations. The validation process can demonstrate the accuracy of both instantaneous and hourly surface solar irradiance data over northern China.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的表面太阳辐射分析数据集包括来自MODIS和MTSAT等卫星的衍生数据。这些数据集可以通过来自气象站的光电测量仪（pyranometer）测量进行验证，例如位于广陶、大兴、英克 oasis、华扎子沙漠和阿柔冻融观测站的测量。验证过程可以展示北方中国瞬时和每小时表面太阳辐射数据的准确性。
